abstract.t: This document describes an extension to IKEv2 that allows an endpoint to prove to a security gateway that it was already authenticated by another trusted security gateway, thereby allowing the authentication of the endpoint without user intervention. This is accomplished using a Short Term Credential that the endpoint requests from the authenticating security gateway. This credential is a certificate issued by the authenticating gateway for a short period of time, and it can be used to authenticate the user with IKE signature based authentication.
